# PLAYER::IS_PLAYER_FREE_AIMING

## Summary
Returns TRUE if the player is free aiming

## Parameters
* **PLAYER_INDEX** player

## Returns
* **BOOL**

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Gets a value indicating whether the specified player is currently aiming freely.
